commands.speaker: Big Sister
commands.line: Thank you for the show.

commands.speaker: Little Sister
commands.line: Bye-bye, magic ladies!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Bye-bye!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Those two are so adorable.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: They really are.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I can't believe they thought we were magicians.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm starting to feel like I really can use magic.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Magic, huh? I wish I could've tried casting some spells, too...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh! I just thought of something good!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Something good?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: How about we change that difficult choreography from earlier to something magical-looking? You know, something like this!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Hmm! That's a great idea!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeah! That looks like it would totally work better!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Great idea, Kasumin!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hehehe! Right? Right? It just came to me in a vision! Maybe that's what my magic power is!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Kasumi, don't get too carried away. More importantly, did you ever apologize to Riko for forcing her into that situation and then running away?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Urgh... Oh yeah. I'm so sorry, Riko.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It's all right. It inspired us to come up with this new choreography, so it all worked out in the end.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Shizuko, too. Thank you.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's not like I did it for you or anything.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: All right then. Let's all try out this new dance move!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes. Can you lead us, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You got it! Okay, everyone, are you ready?! Let's use our magic to perfect this dance!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
